title: No Sound in Keen 2 and 3
content:
Hi All,

Yesterday I reinstalled the 6 great Keen games and wanted to play them. Everything worked fine, but in Commander Keen 2 and 3 the sound is not working though it works in Commander Keen 1. Im using WinXp.

Thanks in advance

Pohli

title: hmm
content: It could be something really simple... Try pressing F2 at any point during the game--a little dialogue box should come up, asking if you want sound on, Y/N.

title: Re: hmm
content:
It could also be your pc speaker.
Sometimes when i play keen it plays sounds really quietly.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: hmm
content: Yeah, try F2 as Xky said. Although, if you install fresh versions they probably shouldn't have any settings.. Sounds are on by default.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: hmm
content:
Lol that was it - It works !!

Thanks a lot to everyone who helped.
